overview: In the maternity hospital, Sergei Panteleev was classified as a "non-resident", his parents refused him, and it seemed that his biography ended before it began. But he survived, did not disappear either in an orphanage or in a neuropsychiatric boarding house. Moreover, at the age of 30, he became the master of his fate, the owner of a one-room apartment and a human rights activist ... He calls himself a "tenacious man".
title: Man on the Other Side
